testcase.name: HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when initialized with valid config it should be able to parse it
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when initialized with a valid config where customer-ids and date intervals are at conviva-id level
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when inherit certain settings from defaults.conf
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when passed same grain 'Daily' for input and output should raise exception
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when passed same grain 'Monthly' for input and output should raise exception
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when passed same grain from course grain to fine grain should raise exception
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when from datetime is later than to datetime should raise exception
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when passed no customerId should raise exception exit
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when passed empty customerId should raise exception exit
HHAssignmentAggregatorConfig when calculating output location should calculate standard output location correctly if no custom job name is passed

testcase.name: HHAssignmentAggregator Object when passed a config with multiple customerIds should create MultiCustomerHouseholdAggregator for each customer
